ygData.subject: Re: To Kilas about advanced smith books
ygData.msgSnippet: The advanced smithing book and the basic smithing book are sold by ogres in the ogre section of the city.  They are 2 street vendors as you walk in ... they
ygData.messageBody:
The advanced smithing book and the basic smithing book are sold by ogres in
the ogre section of the city. They are 2 street vendors as you walk in ...
they also sell some molds. Also their are 2 forges in that area. Although
when you petition ask about the fletching guides, because I have looked and
haven't found them in the city, being a Dark "Elf" you would think we would
have all the supplies to make arrows and bows, except for the stuff we have
to make. :)

Tenin - Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: <SmallBoy99@...>
To: <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 31, 1999 1:47 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] To Kilas about advanced smith books


From: SmallBoy99@...

That's all i know of, and you can't make weapons (I want to petition to sony
about that) Since you're evil, u would probably find the advanced books in
Neriak.

Kilas
